summary: This document is an email exchange regarding the August 10, 2019 incident involving inmate Jeffrey Epstein at the Metropolitan Correctional Center. A captain requests a supervisor memorandum about the incident, while the recipient claims they had already been relieved and had not spoken about it.

persons.name: Captain
persons.context: Requests a supervisor memorandum regarding the incident involving inmate Epstein on August 10, 2019.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Referenced as the inmate involved in an incident at the Metropolitan Correctional Center on August 10, 2019.

connections.description: The Captain, as a supervisor at the correctional center, is responsible for overseeing the incident involving inmate Epstein.

events.title: Epstein Incident at MCC
events.description: An incident involving inmate Jeffrey Epstein occurred at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

events.title: Memorandum Submission Deadline
events.description: Deadline for submitting a supervisor memorandum regarding the Epstein incident.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, 150 Park Row, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: An incident involving inmate Jeffrey Epstein occurred at the Metropolitan Correctional Center on August 10, 2019.
A captain at the MCC requested a supervisor memorandum about the Epstein incident, with a deadline of August 13, 2019.
The email recipient claims they had been properly relieved prior to the incident and had not spoken to anyone about it.
